shortdesc.p: Linkus is a UC softphone coordinated with Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX and Yeastar Cloud PBX. Linkus makes your mobile phone or desktop an office extension and links you and your colleagues and customers anywhere anytime.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Linkus is a UC softphone coordinated with Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX and Yeastar Cloud PBX. Linkus makes your mobile phone or desktop an office extension and links you and your colleagues and customers anywhere anytime.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Before users can log in Linkus clients, you should enable the Linkus server.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Before users can log in Linkus clients, you should enable the Linkus server.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: After setting up the Linkus server, you need to enable Linkus service for extension users to allow them to log in Linkus client.

topicmeta.shortdesc: After setting up the Linkus server, you need to enable Linkus service for extension users to allow them to log in Linkus client.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Linkus server has an email template that contains instructions on how to log in via QR code and link. You can send Linkus emails to allow users to log in Linkus clients by themselves.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Linkus server has an email template that contains instructions on how to log in via QR code and link. You can send Linkus emails to allow users to log in Linkus clients by themselves.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Log in the Extension User Portal to manage your own extensions on web.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Log in the Extension User Portal to manage your own extensions on web.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: By default, extension users can log in the PBX web interface by their own extension accounts. All the extension users can check their own voicemail, one-touch recordings, and configure the extension settings.

topicmeta.shortdesc: By default, extension users can log in the PBX web interface by their own extension accounts. All the extension users can check their own voicemail, one-touch recordings, and configure the extension settings.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: After setting up extensions, the super administrator will send an email that contains the login information to the extension users. You can check the email to get the login information of Extension User Portal.

topicmeta.shortdesc: After setting up extensions, the super administrator will send an email that contains the login information to the extension users. You can check the email to get the login information of Extension User Portal.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: After logging in the Extension User Portal, you can change the login password to a strong and complex one if the current password is weak.

topicmeta.shortdesc: After logging in the Extension User Portal, you can change the login password to a strong and complex one if the current password is weak.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Log in the Extension User Portal to configure your extension settings.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Log in the Extension User Portal to configure your extension settings.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Modify your basic information, such as name, Email, mobile phone number, and prompt.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Modify your basic information, such as name, Email, mobile phone number, and prompt.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: After you log in the Extension User Portal, you can scan QR code to log in Linkus mobile client.

topicmeta.shortdesc: After you log in the Extension User Portal, you can scan QR code to log in Linkus mobile client.

topic.title: Change Ring Time of Your Extension

shortdesc.p: By default, if you don't answer an incoming call in 30 seconds, the call will be forwarded to your voicemail. You can log in the Extension User Portal to adjust how long your extension rings before the incoming call is forwarded.

topicmeta.navtitle: Change Ring Time of Your Extension
topicmeta.linktext: Change Ring Time of Your Extension
topicmeta.shortdesc: By default, if you don't answer an incoming call in 30 seconds, the call will be forwarded to your voicemail. You can log in the Extension User Portal to adjust how long your extension rings before the incoming call is forwarded.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can log in the Extension User Portal to check which outbound route is available, and which number you can dial out.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can log in the Extension User Portal to check which outbound route is available, and which number you can dial out.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Presence status is linked to the call forwarding settings and Linkus ring strategy.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Presence status is linked to the call forwarding settings and Linkus ring strategy.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can log in the Extension User Portal to configure the call forwarding settings and ring strategy for your presence status.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can log in the Extension User Portal to configure the call forwarding settings and ring strategy for your presence status.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can log in the Extension User Portal to switch your presence status. The presence status will be displayed on Linkus client, and the corresponding call forwarding and ring strategy will work.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can log in the Extension User Portal to switch your presence status. The presence status will be displayed on Linkus client, and the corresponding call forwarding and ring strategy will work.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Block untrusted numbers and add trusted numbers for your extension.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Block untrusted numbers and add trusted numbers for your extension.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can log in the Extension User Portal to add blacklist to block incoming numbers from calling your extension and restrict calling undesired outgoing numbers from your extension.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can log in the Extension User Portal to add blacklist to block incoming numbers from calling your extension and restrict calling undesired outgoing numbers from your extension.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: If you don't want to be bothered and want to receive only trusted incoming calls, you can log in Extension User Portal to set trusted incoming numbers.

topicmeta.shortdesc: If you don't want to be bothered and want to receive only trusted incoming calls, you can log in Extension User Portal to set trusted incoming numbers.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: By default, Voicemail function is enabled for you, and if you don't answer a call, the call will be forwarded to your voicemail.

topicmeta.shortdesc: By default, Voicemail function is enabled for you, and if you don't answer a call, the call will be forwarded to your voicemail.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Log in the Extension User Portal to enable or disable voicemail, enable or disable "voicemail to email", check or change your voicemail password, change your voicemail prompt.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Log in the Extension User Portal to enable or disable voicemail, enable or disable "voicemail to email", check or change your voicemail password, change your voicemail prompt.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can log in the Extension User Portal to check your received voicemails and manage the voicemails.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can log in the Extension User Portal to check your received voicemails and manage the voicemails.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: By default, extension users can check and download their own CDR (Call Detail Record) and One-touch Recording files.

topicmeta.shortdesc: By default, extension users can check and download their own CDR (Call Detail Record) and One-touch Recording files.

shortdesc.p: Extension Presence is linked to the call forwarding settings and Linkus ring strategy.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Extension Presence is linked to the call forwarding settings and Linkus ring strategy.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: By default, when the PBX is forwarding an incoming call to another number, the PBX will play the call forwarding prompt "please hold when I try to locate the person you are calling", and then play the MoH music when the caller is waiting. You can disable the call forwarding prompt and change the MoH music to a normal ring tone. In this way, the caller will not realize that the call is forwarded.

topicmeta.shortdesc: By default, when the PBX is forwarding an incoming call to another number, the PBX will play the call forwarding prompt "please hold when I try to locate the person you are calling", and then play the MoH music when the caller is waiting. You can disable the call forwarding prompt and change the MoH music to a normal ring tone. In this way, the caller will not realize that the call is forwarded.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Extension users can dial the Call Forwarding feature codes on their phones to activate or deactivate Call Forwarding function.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Extension users can dial the Call Forwarding feature codes on their phones to activate or deactivate Call Forwarding function.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: By default, the voicemail is enabled for extension users. You can disable the Voicemail function if the user don't need it.

topicmeta.shortdesc: By default, the voicemail is enabled for extension users. You can disable the Voicemail function if the user don't need it.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Voicemail to Email function is disabled by default, if the extension user would like to receive voicemail via email, you can enable the function.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Voicemail to Email function is disabled by default, if the extension user would like to receive voicemail via email, you can enable the function.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: The PBX has a default email template for Voicemail to Email. You can edit the template according to your needs.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The PBX has a default email template for Voicemail to Email. You can edit the template according to your needs.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can dial *2 on your phone to access the voicemail menu. Below is the detailed voicemail menu.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can dial *2 on your phone to access the voicemail menu. Below is the detailed voicemail menu.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You need to set monitor settings for both the supervisors and the monitored users, or the users could not monitor calls successfully.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You need to set monitor settings for both the supervisors and the monitored users, or the users could not monitor calls successfully.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: On the Extension configuration page,you can set the outbound call permissions for the extension user.

topicmeta.shortdesc: On the Extension configuration page,you can set the outbound call permissions for the extension user.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: By default, the PBX allows phones to register extensions without user agent limit. To enhance the extension security, you can restrict which user agent is allowed to register the extension.

shortdesc.p: Set up trunks to make outbound calls or receive inbound calls.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Set up trunks to make outbound calls or receive inbound calls.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: VoIP Trunks are phone lines that transmits calls over the Internet.

topicmeta.shortdesc: VoIP Trunks are phone lines that transmits calls over the Internet.
topicmeta.author: Carol

topic.title: Set up a VoIP Register Trunk

shortdesc.p: If you bought a VoIP account with user name and password, you need to set up a Register Trunk on Yeastar Cloud PBX.

topicmeta.navtitle: Set up a VoIP Register Trunk
topicmeta.linktext: Set up a VoIP Register Trunk
topicmeta.shortdesc: If you bought a VoIP account with user name and password, you need to set up a Register Trunk on Yeastar Cloud PBX.
topicmeta.author: Carol

topic.title: Set up a VoIP Peer Trunk

shortdesc.p: If the ITSP only provides an IP address or domain for your purchased VoIP account, you need to set up a Peer Trunk on the Yeastar Cloud PBX.

topicmeta.navtitle: Set up a VoIP Peer Trunk
topicmeta.linktext: Set up a VoIP Peer Trunk
topicmeta.shortdesc: If the ITSP only provides an IP address or domain for your purchased VoIP account, you need to set up a Peer Trunk on the Yeastar Cloud PBX.
topicmeta.author: Carol

topic.title: Set up a VoIP Account Trunk

shortdesc.p: Create a VoIP Account Trunk on the Yeastar Cloud PBX, and provide this account for the other device to register. In this way, Yeastar Cloud PBX and the other device are connected.

topicmeta.navtitle: Set up a VoIP Account Trunk
topicmeta.linktext: Set up a VoIP Account Trunk
topicmeta.shortdesc: Create a VoIP Account Trunk on the Yeastar Cloud PBX, and provide this account for the other device to register. In this way, Yeastar Cloud PBX and the other device are connected.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Generally, you can set up a VoIP trunk successfully by configuring the settings on the trunk Basic page. Depending on the ITSP, you may need to adjust the codecs, VoIP advanced settings, or set up DOD number to make your VoIP trunk work.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Generally, you can set up a VoIP trunk successfully by configuring the settings on the trunk Basic page. Depending on the ITSP, you may need to adjust the codecs, VoIP advanced settings, or set up DOD number to make your VoIP trunk work.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Each new created VoIP trunk has a default preferred codec list. However, the default codec list may not match the codecs supported by your SIP trunk provider. In order to maximize the quality of calls and the amount of bandwidth used for calls, you’ll want to choose and configure your preferred codec list to match the settings that your SIP trunk provider supports.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Each new created VoIP trunk has a default preferred codec list. However, the default codec list may not match the codecs supported by your SIP trunk provider. In order to maximize the quality of calls and the amount of bandwidth used for calls, you’ll want to choose and configure your preferred codec list to match the settings that your SIP trunk provider supports.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: The advanced settings of VoIP trunk requires professional knowledge of SIP protocol. Incorrect configurations may cause calling issues.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The advanced settings of VoIP trunk requires professional knowledge of SIP protocol. Incorrect configurations may cause calling issues.
topicmeta.author: Carol

topic.title: Set up DOD Numbers on VoIP Trunk

shortdesc.p: DOD (Direct Outwards Dialing) is the caller ID of associated extensions that will be displayed when making outbound calls. You can bind one DOD number to one extension or one DOD number to multiple extensions.

topicmeta.navtitle: Set up DOD Numbers on VoIP Trunk
topicmeta.linktext: Set up DOD Numbers on VoIP Trunk
topicmeta.shortdesc: DOD (Direct Outwards Dialing) is the caller ID of associated extensions that will be displayed when making outbound calls. You can bind one DOD number to one extension or one DOD number to multiple extensions.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: WebRTC (Web Real-Time Communication) is a collection of communications protocols and application programming interfaces that enable real-time communication over peer-to-peer connections. Yeastar Cloud PBX supports WebRTC Click-to-Call that allows the website visitors calling to a pre-configured destination by clicking a link/button the web page.

topicmeta.shortdesc: WebRTC (Web Real-Time Communication) is a collection of communications protocols and application programming interfaces that enable real-time communication over peer-to-peer connections. Yeastar Cloud PBX supports WebRTC Click-to-Call that allows the website visitors calling to a pre-configured destination by clicking a link/button the web page.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Create a WebRTC trunk on the PBX, and place the generated link in your website. When a website visitor clicks the link, a WebRTC call will be established between the visitor and the pre-configured destination of the PBX.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Create a WebRTC trunk on the PBX, and place the generated link in your website. When a website visitor clicks the link, a WebRTC call will be established between the visitor and the pre-configured destination of the PBX.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: An outbound route works like a traffic cop giving directions to road users to use a predefined route to reach a predefined destination.

topicmeta.shortdesc: An outbound route works like a traffic cop giving directions to road users to use a predefined route to reach a predefined destination.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: To allow users make outbound calls through trunks, you need to set up at least an outbound route on the PBX.

topicmeta.shortdesc: To allow users make outbound calls through trunks, you need to set up at least an outbound route on the PBX.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: The PBX will search for a matching dial pattern from the top route. If a route with higher priority is matched, the PBX will not continue going down the route list to search a "better" route.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The PBX will search for a matching dial pattern from the top route. If a route with higher priority is matched, the PBX will not continue going down the route list to search a "better" route.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: To make an outbound calls from the PBX, users need to dial according to dial pattern settings of the outbound routes.

topicmeta.shortdesc: To make an outbound calls from the PBX, users need to dial according to dial pattern settings of the outbound routes.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Sample configurations that will help you understand outbound route dial patterns.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Sample configurations that will help you understand outbound route dial patterns.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: The PBX has a default rule to limit how many outbound calls a user can make during a certain time period.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The PBX has a default rule to limit how many outbound calls a user can make during a certain time period.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Emergency calls have the highest priority. Extension users can make emergency calls at any time.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Emergency calls have the highest priority. Extension users can make emergency calls at any time.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: An inbound route is used to tell the PBX where to route inbound calls based on the caller's phone number or the DID number. Inbound routes are often used in conjunction with time conditions and an IVR.

topicmeta.shortdesc: An inbound route is used to tell the PBX where to route inbound calls based on the caller's phone number or the DID number. Inbound routes are often used in conjunction with time conditions and an IVR.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: To receive external calls on the PBX, you need to set up at least one inbound route.

topicmeta.shortdesc: To receive external calls on the PBX, you need to set up at least one inbound route.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: DID (Direct Inward Dialing) is a telephone service that allows outside users to reach a certain destination instead of going to a receptionist or a queue and needing to dial an extension number.

topicmeta.shortdesc: DID (Direct Inward Dialing) is a telephone service that allows outside users to reach a certain destination instead of going to a receptionist or a queue and needing to dial an extension number.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Below are sample configurations that will help you understand inbound route DID setting and Caller ID setting.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Below are sample configurations that will help you understand inbound route DID setting and Caller ID setting.
topicmeta.author: Carol

topic.title: Distinguish Inbound Calls by Ring Tones

shortdesc.p: Distinctive ring tone distinguishes calls from different inbound routes. You can set distinctive ring tone on different inbound routes. When a user hears the ring tone of the incoming call, he/she may notice the intention of the incoming call.

topicmeta.navtitle: Distinguish Inbound Calls by Ring Tones
topicmeta.linktext: Distinguish Inbound Calls by Ring Tones
topicmeta.shortdesc: Distinctive ring tone distinguishes calls from different inbound routes. You can set distinctive ring tone on different inbound routes. When a user hears the ring tone of the incoming call, he/she may notice the intention of the incoming call.
topicmeta.author: Carol

topic.title: Distinguish Inbound Calls by DNIS Name

shortdesc.p: DNIS (Dialed Number Identification Service) is used to distinguish incoming calls by trunks. For example, a company has multiple trunks, and each trunk has its function. In this case, we will need DNIS to change the display name of incoming calls.

topicmeta.navtitle: Distinguish Inbound Calls by DNIS Name
topicmeta.linktext: Distinguish Inbound Calls by DNIS Name
topicmeta.shortdesc: DNIS (Dialed Number Identification Service) is used to distinguish incoming calls by trunks. For example, a company has multiple trunks, and each trunk has its function. In this case, we will need DNIS to change the display name of incoming calls.
topicmeta.author: Carol

topic.title: Distinguish Inbound Calls by Caller ID

shortdesc.p: When incoming calls are routed from a ring group, a queue or an IVR, the PBX can display the name of ring group/queue/IVR. When the extension user receive a call from the ring group/queue/IVR, he/she may notice the intention of the incoming call.

topicmeta.navtitle: Distinguish Inbound Calls by Caller ID
topicmeta.linktext: Distinguish Inbound Calls by Caller ID
topicmeta.shortdesc: When incoming calls are routed from a ring group, a queue or an IVR, the PBX can display the name of ring group/queue/IVR. When the extension user receive a call from the ring group/queue/IVR, he/she may notice the intention of the incoming call.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Time conditions are used to control call flow based upon time and date.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Time conditions are used to control call flow based upon time and date.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: A Time Condition defines periods of time that can be applied to outbound routes or inbound routes.

topicmeta.shortdesc: A Time Condition defines periods of time that can be applied to outbound routes or inbound routes.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can add a group of holidays and set a Time Condition destination for the holidays on your inbound route. When a customer calls to your company during holidays, the PBX will route the call to the pre-configured destination.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can add a group of holidays and set a Time Condition destination for the holidays on your inbound route. When a customer calls to your company during holidays, the PBX will route the call to the pre-configured destination.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: The Time Condition Override function is used to switch the incoming call routing against the Time Condition. An authorised user can dial Time Condition feature code to override the time condition.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The Time Condition Override function is used to switch the incoming call routing against the Time Condition. An authorised user can dial Time Condition feature code to override the time condition.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can set a BLF key on your phone to quickly override time condition and monitor the time condition state.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can set a BLF key on your phone to quickly override time condition and monitor the time condition state.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Yeastar Cloud PBX can automatically stores records of outgoing call to AutoCLIP route table. When the called person calls back, the call will be routed directly to the original caller's extension.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Yeastar Cloud PBX can automatically stores records of outgoing call to AutoCLIP route table. When the called person calls back, the call will be routed directly to the original caller's extension.

shortdesc.p: Set up AutoCLIP routes if you want to record the inbound calls and call back to the original callers.

shortdesc.p: Shared Line Appearance (SLA) feature helps users share SIP trunks. It also helps monitor the status of the shared line. SLA feature works with BLF key on IP phones.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Shared Line Appearance (SLA) feature helps users share SIP trunks. It also helps monitor the status of the shared line. SLA feature works with BLF key on IP phones.

shortdesc.p: You need at least two IP phones to set up SLA. In a boss-assistant scenario, the boss will share the SIP Trunk1 with the assistant.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You need at least two IP phones to set up SLA. In a boss-assistant scenario, the boss will share the SIP Trunk1 with the assistant.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: After the SLA is configured on trunks and IP phone BLF keys, the users can share the same trunk and make outbound calls, handle calls by the BLF keys.

topicmeta.shortdesc: After the SLA is configured on trunks and IP phone BLF keys, the users can share the same trunk and make outbound calls, handle calls by the BLF keys.

shortdesc.p: Yeastar Cloud PBX supports adapting Caller ID for trunks. If the incoming Caller ID is adapted, you can press the call record directly on your phone to call back a number.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Yeastar Cloud PBX supports adapting Caller ID for trunks. If the incoming Caller ID is adapted, you can press the call record directly on your phone to call back a number.

shortdesc.p: Like most organisations, where possible, we would like to route incoming calls an Auto Attendant. You can create one or more IVR (Auto Attendant) on the system to achieve it.

shortdesc.p: A ring group helps you to ring a group of extensions in a variety of ring strategies. For example, you could define all the technical support guys' extensions in a ring group and ring the support guys one by one.

topicmeta.shortdesc: A dynamic agent can log in or log out a queue at any time.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Both the PBX extension users and the external users can join the conference.

shortdesc.p: Call Pickup is a feature that allows a user to answer an incoming call that rings on a telephone other than the user’s own.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Call Pickup is a feature that allows a user to answer an incoming call that rings on a telephone other than the user’s own.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: When a user wants to pick up a call that is ringing at the other extension that is not in the same pickup group, the user can dial "Extension Pickup feature code (default *04) + Extension Number" to pick up the call.

topicmeta.shortdesc: When a user wants to pick up a call that is ringing at the other extension that is not in the same pickup group, the user can dial "Extension Pickup feature code (default *04) + Extension Number" to pick up the call.

topic.title: Pick up an Extension's Call by BLF

shortdesc.p: You can set a BLF key of Extension Call Pickup on your phone. The BLF key will show the real-time status of the extension. When the extension is ringing, you can press the BLF key to pick up the call.

topicmeta.navtitle: Pick up an Extension's Call by BLF
topicmeta.linktext: Pick up an Extension's Call by BLF
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can set a BLF key of Extension Call Pickup on your phone. The BLF key will show the real-time status of the extension. When the extension is ringing, you can press the BLF key to pick up the call.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: If extension users are in the same pickup group, they can dial the Group Call Pickup feature code (default *4) to pick up the group member's incoming call.

topicmeta.shortdesc: If extension users are in the same pickup group, they can dial the Group Call Pickup feature code (default *4) to pick up the group member's incoming call.

shortdesc.p: Generally, You can set the extension users who are in the same department in a pickup group.

shortdesc.p: You can set a BLF key for Group Call Pickup on your IP phone. When your group member's phone is ringing, you can press the BLF key to quickly pick up the call.

topicmeta.linktext: Pick up A Group Member's Call by BLF
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can set a BLF key for Group Call Pickup on your IP phone. When your group member's phone is ringing, you can press the BLF key to quickly pick up the call.

shortdesc.p: Yeastar Cloud PBX supports Attended Transfer and Blind Transfer, users can dial the feature code to transfer a call on their phones.

shortdesc.p: Callback feature allows callers to hang up and get called back to the PBX. Callback feature could reduce the cost for the users who work out of the office using their own mobile phones.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Add a Callback rule and set Inbound Route destination to the Callback rule.

shortdesc.p: Sometimes you may just need to call someone quickly without having to look up his/her phone number. You can by simply define a shortcut number. You can use Speed Dial feature to place a call by pressing a reduced number of keys.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Sometimes you may just need to call someone quickly without having to look up his/her phone number. You can by simply define a shortcut number. You can use Speed Dial feature to place a call by pressing a reduced number of keys.

shortdesc.p: DISA (Direct Inward System Access) allows users outside the office to make calls through the PBX's trunks. For the staffs who are outside the office, they can use DISA feature to take advantage of lower long-distance rates that are provided by the PBX trunks.

topicmeta.shortdesc: DISA (Direct Inward System Access) allows users outside the office to make calls through the PBX's trunks. For the staffs who are outside the office, they can use DISA feature to take advantage of lower long-distance rates that are provided by the PBX trunks.

shortdesc.p: During a call, you can dial the One Touch Record feature code to start recording the call; dial the feature code again to stop the recording.

topicmeta.shortdesc: During a call, you can dial the One Touch Record feature code to start recording the call; dial the feature code again to stop the recording.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Call Recording is a feature that enables the PBX to automatically record internal calls, external calls, and conference calls.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Call Recording is a feature that enables the PBX to automatically record internal calls, external calls, and conference calls.
topicmeta.author: Carol

p.span: To use Call Recording on your PBX, contact your PBX provider to buy the Recording capacity. By default, you can enjoy 500-minute recording time for free.

shortdesc.ph: To use Call Recording on your PBX, contact your PBX provider to buy the Recording capacity. By default, you can enjoy 500-minute recording time for free.

shortdesc.p: During an external call, the extension user can pause the Call Recording and then resume the Call Recording to avoid the sensitive personal information such as credit card details being recorded.

topicmeta.shortdesc: During an external call, the extension user can pause the Call Recording and then resume the Call Recording to avoid the sensitive personal information such as credit card details being recorded.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: When you pause and resume the Call Recording during a call, you may need to know if the call recording state is switched successfully or not. You can set a BLF key on your IP phone to monitor the call recording status of your current call.

topicmeta.shortdesc: When you pause and resume the Call Recording during a call, you may need to know if the call recording state is switched successfully or not. You can set a BLF key on your IP phone to monitor the call recording status of your current call.
topicmeta.author: Carol

p.span: When the recording capacity limit is reached, the PBX will automatically delete the oldest recording files. When 80% of the maximum recording capacity is reached, the PBX will send an email notification to you.

shortdesc.ph: When the recording capacity limit is reached, the PBX will automatically delete the oldest recording files. When 80% of the maximum recording capacity is reached, the PBX will send an email notification to you.

shortdesc.p: Go to CDR and Recordings to search, play, download, or delete the recording files.

topicmeta.shortdesc:
Go to
CDR and Recordings to search, play, download, or delete the recording files.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: By default, only the super administrator has permission to manage the call recording files. The super administrator can grant recording permission to extension users and allow the users to play, download, and delete recording files.

topicmeta.shortdesc: By default, only the super administrator has permission to manage the call recording files. The super administrator can grant recording permission to extension users and allow the users to play, download, and delete recording files.

shortdesc.p: The Paging and Intercom features allow you to make an announcement to a group of extensions. The called parties do not need to pick up the handset as the audio will be played via the phone speakers.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The Paging and Intercom features allow you to make an announcement to a group of extensions. The called parties do not need to pick up the handset as the audio will be played via the phone speakers.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Paging is used to make an announcement over the speakerphone to a phone or group of phones. The called parties will not ring, but instead answer immediately into speakerphone mode.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Paging is used to make an announcement over the speakerphone to a phone or group of phones. The called parties will not ring, but instead answer immediately into speakerphone mode.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: 2-way intercom is used to make a multi-party conference. The called parties will automatically answer the call into speakerphone mode and join the conference.

topicmeta.shortdesc: 2-way intercom is used to make a multi-party conference. The called parties will automatically answer the call into speakerphone mode and join the conference.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: Multicast Paging allows you to easily and quickly broadcast instant audio announcements to phone users who are listening to the same multicast IP address of the PBX.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Multicast Paging allows you to easily and quickly broadcast instant audio announcements to phone users who are listening to the same multicast IP address of the PBX.
topicmeta.author: Carol

topic.title: Make an Announcement to a Specific User

shortdesc.p: Extension users can dial the intercom feature code to make an intercom to a specific extension, the called party can respond immediately without picking up the handset.

topicmeta.linktext: Make an Announcement to a Specific User
topicmeta.shortdesc: Extension users can dial the intercom feature code to make an intercom to a specific extension, the called party can respond immediately without picking up the handset.

shortdesc.p: Call Parking is a feature that allows you to suspend a call for an extended period of time and then retrieve that call from any extension.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Call Parking is a feature that allows you to suspend a call for an extended period of time and then retrieve that call from any extension.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: You can set a BLF key of Call Parking on your phone. The BLF key will show the real-time status of the parking slot. If the parking slot is vacant, you can press the BLF key to park a call to the parking slot.

topicmeta.shortdesc: You can set a BLF key of Call Parking on your phone. The BLF key will show the real-time status of the parking slot. If the parking slot is vacant, you can press the BLF key to park a call to the parking slot.
topicmeta.author: Carol

shortdesc.p: By default, when you retrieve a parked call, the call-park slot number (e.g. 6900) will be displayed on the phone. To display the original caller ID of the user who you were talking to, you need to configure SIP settings to get caller ID from Remote- Party-ID SIP header.

topicmeta.shortdesc: By default, when you retrieve a parked call, the call-park slot number (e.g. 6900) will be displayed on the phone. To display the original caller ID of the user who you were talking to, you need to configure SIP settings to get caller ID from Remote- Party-ID SIP header.

shortdesc.p: Yeastar Cloud PBX supports Fax over IP. You can send or receive a fax via a physical fax machine or receive a fax over the network.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Yeastar Cloud PBX supports Fax over IP. You can send or receive a fax via a physical fax machine or receive a fax over the network.

shortdesc.p: Fax to Email feature helps you receive faxes on your smart phone or computer. Yeastar Cloud PBX will convert the received fax and forward it to an extension user's email.

topicmeta.shortdesc: Fax to Email feature helps you receive faxes on your smart phone or computer. Yeastar Cloud PBX will convert the received fax and forward it to an extension user's email.

topic.title: Receive Fax through a Dedicated Trunk

shortdesc.p: You can assign one or more trunks to receive faxes, and tell your customers to send faxes to the dedicated trunk number.

topicmeta.linktext: Receive Fax through a Dedicated Trunk
topicmeta.shortdesc: You can assign one or more trunks to receive faxes, and tell your customers to send faxes to the dedicated trunk number.

shortdesc.p: Whitelist is used to allow incoming/outgoing numbers. Blacklist is used to block an incoming/outgoing call.
